name: The Eyes of Doom
description:
Spooktober Spooktacular Game Jam entry.  

 RPG Maker web forums

The Eyes of DOOM are coming for you!

Based on a short story I wrote some years ago about one of the most terrifying events of my youth.

Very short game of <10 minutes.

Most of the sprites and animations are custom edits of the RTP and DLC assets.

Many custom sound effects.
